content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north west on hwy 40/64, west of the city of st. charles near hwy n. while driving, intuition urged me to look into the sky above me. i saw about 20-25 objects sort of floating on the wind almost directly above my location on the highway. i pulled off the road once i realized they were not birds. their distance from me is hard to determine, but they were certainly close enough for me to describe. their shape was like a boomerang or a triangle, similarly shaped like a b-2 except with a smoother contour to the aft section of its profile, at least from below. they were colored a brilliant white except for the tips of the wings which appeared to be black. their movement was akin to a kite, swirling in and out of each others flight paths, at what appeared to be the same height. they remained bunched together as i attempted to take a picture with my iphone, which did not come out, unfortunately. it seems as though as soon as i took the picture, they collectively, and with purpose headed east, at a very quick pace. much faster than any bird or kite or ultra-lite. faster than any civilian craft of that size, and i am certain it is nothing in our current declassified military aresnal either, as i am a former soldier of the u.S. army, aviation technitian, and military aviation enthusiast. as they moved off to the east at their unnaturally brisk pace, they met up with another group of the same typ of objects, now numbering about 30 or so. the sun glinted off of of them one last moment, then they nearly dissappeared instantaneously. without proper telemetry equipment or visual aid, my best guess is that they mainatined an altitude of about 4-5k meters and when they grouped with the others, they increased altitude and speed, in a direction directly away from me. 
this is my first personal sighting, and of course, i was very excited and shaking through the entire event, and afterwards. very exciting to say the least. what is interesting is that just a moment before-hand, i was scaaning my energy, the energy oaround me and my intuition guided me to feel that there was a sort of a void or a blockage of energy, or perhaps an abundance of it, above and slightly to the right of me. i felt that there was something there. i looked and there they were. 
the picture is not of great quality, but the objeects can be faintly seen just below the large bird, a vulture i believe, as the image is originally oriented. i did my best. i hope this helps in some way.
content.summary: Flock of objects seen flying above location  of observation. objects suddenly and simlutaneously moved to the east

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba en mi trabajo en el estand de taxi  era  las 9:35 de la noche y se sintio un leve sunvido a mi lado izquierdo al subir la vista lo vi y me quede con la boca abierta era como un disco semiovalado y tenia luces amarillas a su alrededor  que aun a se brian comodel tamano de aros de trucks prendiendo y apagando mientras sobre volava en el agua donde esta el mueller 4 de san juan duro como un minuto y gracias a dios no estaba sola porque hasta hubiera pensado que estaba mal de la vista y senti frio mucho frio la sensacion de que te estan obsevando y cuando las luces se apagaron senti temor y escalosfrios lo grabe todo y lo mande a mi mail. el ovni se fue hacia la izquierda de imediato se oyo un helicoptero y un avion sobre volando la zona
por favor la pagina no se porque no me da laopcion de atachar el video desde mi telefono mandeme una direccion de correo electronico quiero que tengan el video y lo analicen
content.summary: Ovni en san juan puerto rico

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on 4th. in the space above the street i saw a bright yellow-gold light moving at a very high rate of speed moving south to north. too fast to be any sort of plane, but traveling parallel to the ground. i only saw it for a short time due to the trees and it's speed.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking up in the sky in the western sky.  there is a star formation in the sky with a diamond shape from my vision approx. 2 to 3 inches above the star formation there was a flashing light.  this light was way too high to be a plane and not a satellite.  i have watched the skies for many years and often see strange things, i know what should be there and what is odd.  
what set these lights apart was they flashed in sequence.  had a pattern of three flashes approx five seconds apart and would go dark for maybe a thirty second period of time just to start back up with the pattern of flashes.  i thought this was odd due to start might glimmer but do not flash in a sequence like that.  after approx.  two minutes they ceased.  
nine days ago i seen something in the sky along with my family that was clearly no plane or satellite but in a similar distance as a satellite would be but much brighter. what was odd about this is that is was in the same trajectory as what i seen tonight, they both seemed more than a coincidence.  what i seen last week was extremely bright for being an hour before sunset.  it ended up stationary before it disappeared before crossing the bath of an obvious airplane.  its illumination was extremely bright for daytime.  
the first instance i just happened to be piering up at the time on my way to the store.  my mother, her boyfriend and my niece were witnesses to the first sighting.  tonight i was just looking at stars like a often do and it stood out clear as day.
content.summary: Flashing light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving ridge rd. rockwall tx. was alarmed saw craft decending i l ooked noticed others watching.It was distracting i thought it was going to crash. it appeared to stop and hover was white and blue with symbols or writing on it. i had to proceed down the road almost hit someone.I called 911 they said others called also they said it was military visiters.I never seen anything like it.It was alarming.
content.summary: Interstate 30 rockwall tx. i was driving ridge rd. saw plane or craft with wings and tail was blue craft was white with symbols not sure, decended very low over walmart several people saw it called 911 said military visiter tour . craft hovered .

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on the 5 freeway coming over the 5/14 connector and se of me i saw a shiny white circular object in the sky. it was moving slowly east and as i watch the sky all the time i was waiting for a sign to debunch it. but it was moving slower than a plane could and slower than a helicopter normal moves. this lasted for about 15 seconds. it seemed to be traveling toward the strange cloud formations that had produced flash thunder storms over the last day. the ufo however never went behind the clouds and stayed within the open, clear sky. so i watched it the entire time then out of no where it seemed to flash away to nothing. there one second gone the next. i tried searching for it in the sky but could not find anything. this was pretty cool and wild at the same time. this doesn't make any sense to me so i am pretty certain it was a ufo.
content.summary: The ufo was shiny white

content.detailedDescription: I was waking my dog. when all of a sudden he was barking in the sky.  birds flying everywhere all crazy.  thats when i saw it.  it came soaring over my house. turned the whole sky purple. i then saw a big flash aimed right at me. i was scared for my life.  then all of a sudden my dog was beamed up into the sky.  i grabbed my dog and i was beamed up to the air craft.  there were lights every where!!! and then i blacked out. when i awoke i was in a room with bright lights blinding me, and i could here suddle talking but i couldn't understand what they were saying.  then they experimented on me but i dont want to say what they did because it was to horrible to relive because they touched me in my no-no spot. i yelled for help then i heard david hasselhoff it was going to be ok he was next to me holding my hand very tight. when i awoke in my bed the next morning my butt was sore and i think my liver is gone and  i had a big bulge in my stomach.
content.summary: Star like fireball flying through the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the news channel kvoa ch 4 tucson with a femail roomate regarding a ufo event on film a few days prior. at that moment her friend came inside and said you need to come outside and see this. when i went outside i seen an obect , a light in the sky, nw of my address and i then ran to get my camera and i captured this very breif vid . i was rushing to get find the night application for the sony camera when i found this video....Please let me know 1. the distance from the camrea and 2. the size of the object please. thank you  [name deleted/cms/tg]
content.summary: Circle size object observered in clear night sky over tucson arizona

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home in my apartment getting dressed for the day when i noticed some movement out of the corner of my eye. i turned my head to look out of my north-facing window and saw, very clearly, an airborne object gliding slowly northward. the weather was partly cloudy but the object moved low in the sky, well below the clouds, and for the entirety of the sighting it remained at a consistent speed (slower than an airplane/faster than the wind that morning) and on a consistent altitude. 
the first thing that struck me was how the object was behaving as it flew. this is going to be tough to describe but i'll give it my best shot. like a spun top slowly losing momentum the center of this solid metal disc stayed stationary while the outer rim dipped methodically as it traveled. it was a very attention-catching motion that allowed me to see every detail on every side of the object. my mind was trying very hard to convince me that it was a balloon of some sort. my eyes wholly disagreed. the top of the disc was convex, smooth, and featureless. the bottom side was the same except for six (give or take) smooth bulges, or warts, evenly spaced protruding in a circle near the outer edge of the disc.
the object made no noise as it moved overhead and traveled north, directly over the i-405 bridge and it simply shrank into the distance and finally disappeared. aside from its undulating motion, it seemed to be out for a leisurely stroll.
the entire sighting lasted about eight minutes and filled me with awe and excitement. being my first sighting i honestly did not think to film it as it was happening but i did think about calling a local friend of mine and ask if he could see it too, but since my phone was on the other side of the room and i did not want to miss a second of witnessing this astonishing happening i made no such phone call. i did, however, attempt to wake my sleeping girlfriend, and despite my elated cries of "oh my god!" and "hurry! come see this!" she was too tired to want any part of what i was freaking out about.
post-sighting i was left with a warm afterglow. the experience seemed to fill me with energy and optimism. i'm in no way a skywatcher. i've never doubted that we aren't alone in the universe, but until that day i had little interest in looking for evidence of ets. i'm posting this out of sheer curiosity. i want to know who else saw what i saw. an object that size behaving the way it was directly on top of downtown portland did not go unnoticed. does anyone have a practical explanation? did anyone else see the damn thing?
content.summary: Matte silver metallic disc wobbled/undulated slowly northward directly over downtown portland

content.detailedDescription: Was checking out the north east sky because of hearing about a visible comet when something cought my attention out of the corner of my eye out of the north north eastern sky . i changed my position to see what it was . about ten seconds later i saw in a dark are of the sky a light slowly apear and become bright then two to three seconds later dim to nothing . at first i thought maybe an aircrafts blinking lights . then again about ten seconds later it again repeated what i had seen . it did this three or four times in what apeared to be the same place in the sky . i contineud to watch but did not see tthe light any more . i was suprised that for as bright as the light would become i could not see any other typeof light that would normaly be seen with a airplane or helicopter
content.summary: Light slowly blinking

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on my front porch, sitting on the steps smoking a cigarette.
i wasn't wearing my glasses, but something in the sky caught my attention. it looked like a bunch of little white lights moving northwest across the sky. they were all grouped together in sort of a flock formation.  i went inside to get my glasses, hoping to see it or something like it again.  i wanted to be sure what i was seeing.  
sure enough, only a couple of minutes later, there was another flock of lights, this time moving in the opposite direction.  there were another 5 sightings within the next 10 minutes.  the last one was very distinct.  there were 5 lights moving together in a group.  they would spread apart some and then cluster back together.  the other groups had too many lights to count. i asked my boyfriend if he wanted to come outside and look and he said, "that's okay, i'm good.  i don't want to get freaked out."
all of the groups suddenly appeared, flew across the sky and then they would eventually fade out.  anywhere from 10 seconds to a couple of minutes later, another group would appear.
honestly, i wasn't sure if i wanted to go back outside after i got my glasses.  wasn't really sure if i wanted to confirm what i had seen or not.  but i went out anyways, i was a little scared, but also curious.  
very strange indeed.
content.summary: "flock of lights"

content.detailedDescription: I remember that on that particular night the weather was very misty and light rain would fall. that night i had a wierd sensation that something was going to happen. 1 hour later i entered a cafe/bar and ordered a drink and sat with my best friend viewing parc avenue north. then all of a sudden i noticed the first ball of fire descending from the sky over the town of mount royal. it was very obvious that the ball of fire suddenly lit up while it was descending below the misty clouds. seconds later the second ball of fire descended in the same fashion as the first. these objects lit up only when they were descending close over the town.The entire town of mount royal was illuninated in orange/red light. because it was greek orthodox eatser night i thought at first that it might be fireworks. greek orthodox kids often light up fire crackers celebrating the resurrection of jesus christ but i personally have never seen them throw flares or fireworks but i guess i was trying to find an explanation to what i saw. however the theory of these balls of fire being fireworks was flawed because fireworks do not light up as they are descending from the sky and these balls of fire came downwards in a very shaky way resembling a falling leaf or as if gliding downwards. this event took place at least 3 miles or more away from me so after witnessing the balls of fire eescending i could no longer see their activity but only the glow over the town. i had no car to drive there to investigate so i left it to that. the next morning i read the local newspaper and there was a story about ufo's over the town of mount royal descrbed as red/orange fireballs hovering silently all over the town as witnesses described it. only then i fully realized that what i witnessed was not fireworks but an actual ufo phenomena and that what witnesses describe about the characteristics of it are true and accurate. i have pondered since a little child to discover the meaning of these ufo's as we may call them but have only clouded theories and no solid answers. these balls of fire seemed intelligent but what on earth were they doing that night? what are they? too many questions......
content.summary: Looking out through the window of a cafe i noticed a ball of fire orange/red descending from the sky and then another similar ball of fire descending from the sky causing the entire neighbourhood to glow red.

content.detailedDescription:
I was between for four and five years of age when i had my encounter.
my family and i were living in small town westend of montrose county called uravan colorado. in the early morning june of 69 i was waken by the barking of family dog name tippi outside by bedroom window. tippi never really barked unless someone or something was in a yard that wasn't supposed to be. i remember wakening up out dead sleep and hearing tippi consant barking and wondering why older brother whose sleeping bunk above and my parents sleeping in the bedroom joining ours weren't get tell tippi to be quit. finally i had enough it and decided turn over in my bed and look out the window myself. when i did i couldn't believe what saw. there it was a small circle ship with its landed gear down and hatch with stairs fold down to the ground.Next to ship where green kinda lizard looking aliens. their eyes were bright yellow,and the sometanks on there backs and another bag.They didn't have fingers but kinda web hands that look like to a bow and arrow.Their body were thin,and scaley,and legs also then,their feet had v shaped toes i remember thinking to myself this was somekinda hunting party, because my dad was bow hunter himself and that kinda gave the idea. i could tell the wear searching for something, then all the sudden another alien came of the ship. he was much bigger then the others and seemed to give the others orders. tippi again began her barking and the alien closes to our house seemed to be upset with her barking. i could see it looking over at tippi, finally it appear "it" to had a problem with tippi barking and started walking over her. i then jump of my bed and headed into my parents room to wake my mother up. i remember how hard it was to wake my mother up and she acted like she was heavy drug or something.I couldn't get her wake up. finally was able to get her up and told something was going on outside that it was going hurt tippi, she still not wake and sluggish my mother followed me to bed. once there i showed what i was seeing outside. i don't what they did to my mom but she couldn't see them. all she wanted to do is sleep. finally my mother got up from my bed and told me crawl to other side my bed away from the window. i did what i told. the last thing remember before going to sleep,was looking over in closet where window casted light on my close and saw to dark figure trying to look in window. no other sound came from tippi. my mother wasn't  drinking or taking anything that would make sadation. i firm believe they did somthing to family make sleep. it just didn't work on me. the morning the first i did was to run out check on tippi in pj all. sure enough she was lying in front yard waiting for kids to come play with her. she acted like nothing happen the night before.
content.summary: A ship and 4 to 5 aliens in uranvan colorado 1969

content.detailedDescription: I got off my bus, it was about 6:45, with my headphones still in, and headed for my school. i like to watch the the sky as i walk in because it's that nice time right before the sun rises. i was looking at the sky above the woods the turned my head towards the gym/pool building, which is to my left when i was it, it was a diamond like shape and it seemed to be glowing, it was white with a very very small hint of yellow, it looked aboout as far away as a plane would be but was much larger than a star or a plane light. it didn't flicker at all and it just sat there, i watched it as i kept walking wondering what it was, it didn't move or sway at all it just stayed still.I began to wonder if i was insane, suddenly i heard a russle in the bushes to my right i quicly looked at it hoping to catch sight of the rumored racoon that hangs around in our creek but saw nothing. i looked back to where i saw the diamond and it was still there, i looked around and no one else seemed to notice it. then i just kept staring at it in wonder, and it still did not move at all, i was starting to get a bit freaked out when i triped i looked had to look away to balance myself. i imediatly looked back to the area in the sky where i saw the diamond and it was gone, it just vanished, i looked all around the sky and didn't see it at all. now i was really freaked out and i wasn't about to tell anyone incase they might find it strange.
content.summary: There was a diamond like object just sitting in the sky above my school's building.

content.detailedDescription:
Back when my husband and i were dating, (1968) we were riding around on the 4th of july, looking for fireworks displays. we wanted to watch them and it was about 8:45 p.M. so we figured they were already going off. we drove to arlington heights (arlington, ma) to get up high enough to look around for fireworks but we saw something we didn't expect.
 
actually, i saw it while my husband was driving, he couldn't take his eyes off the road; we were going uphill on a street in arlington with me watching the sky and suddenly, i saw something odd. it was a curved string of lights, set on an angle, just above the rooftops and it was moving uphill at the same speed that we were. it popped in and out of view as it went behind the tops of trees and houses along the street. then it began to pick up speed so we accelerated until we were doing 70 mph going up that hill. then it went faster and faster until we couldn't keep up and it disappeared. every time my husband tried to look at it, it went behind a rooftop and he didn't get to see it. there were no other vehicles on the street at the time.

we did not have a camera with us, but i have vivid memories of the incident. i have recreated the image in photoshop and included it here.
content.summary: I saw a curved string of white lights just above the rooftops, moving at a very high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a bright star just below the quarter moon.  watched for three minutes and observed no movement (if there was movement, it was at the same rate as the moon).  went to get a camera but returning less than two minutes later, the object was no longer visable.  in scanning the sky, i observed two similar but not as bright objects overhead.  while remaining in the same part of the sky, they appeared to interact with each other.  one disappears while the other remains.  in trying to locate the missing object, i discover three more faint object in the northwest, heading in a northerly direction.  these were very far away as they twinkled similar to stars.  there is a tree obstructing my view to the north, however for a brief moment, a much brighter object which appeared to be much closer appeared from behind the tree, traveling at a fair rate of speed, heading east.  the closer object disappeared over the hills east of my location within a minute.  i was unable to locate the three previous objects but discovered two more straight above.  these also appeared to be interacting with each other but were very faint.  within 25 minutes of my first observation, i could not locate any other objects.

the distance was too great to any photos and i didn't get a picture of the closest object as i was unable to locate it with the camera before is passed.

i initially thought these could be the reflection of weather balloons, however the objects didn't seem to relate to any particular wind direction and conditions on the ground are near calm.

i'm reporting this to see if anyone noticed these objects in other areas in town.
content.summary: Several stars appearing during daylight

content.detailedDescription: I  am 49 years old and on the 16/09/2010i was woke up by the sound of a helicopter above my house when my partner went to look he said there was a light above it by the time i got out of bed the helicopter had gone but the light remained in the sky i managed to take several photos and a few videos it wasn't until i woke up and looked at the pics that i realised how clear the photo's are the photos are in my camera memory so my father put them on the computer for me each photo is different and they have made me feel really  scared to look at them there is clear images of something lifelike a few of them really do look like aliens but i just think people will laugh at me .My family and friends have all said i need them to be looked at.I have tried to get someone to take a look but don't know where to go from here.Cannot explain what i thought it was i also noticed some very small light coming of it they where red and blue at one point i saw it change into a blue circle with tiny red and blue lights inside the circle which resembled a bycicle wheel it changed back after a short time i actually was looking at it at the time.This was when i got really scared and was so shocked i screamed for my partner to come. i continued to watch it untill 4/45am when i noticed it goin away from my veiw.
content.summary: Bright light in sky looked like it was changing shape

content.detailedDescription: Sighting began at approximately 7:40 a.M.. i noticed a black sphere at cloud level moving in zig zag pattern. the sphere moved in and out of the surrounding cloud's, but staying withing close proximity of the near by cloud.After about 1 minute of viewing the sphere, it was joined by two other ors of the approximate size. the three spere's moved around one another in same movement and behavior.  the three objects then moved in and out of the same cloud. after about four minutes of viewing this behaviour, the three objects dissappeared within the clouds and were lost in sight.
content.summary: Three orb's at cloud level, moving in zig zag pattern

content.detailedDescription:
nice clear day so i wanted to try and confirm the sighting i had last night, 9/27/10, so i had been sitting outside in a fold out chair for about half an hour. i made sure to be real careful and preserve my night vision as best i could by putting the neighbor's light to my back and staying out of the reflections from the windows. this time i had brought a crappy little digital camera that had video too hoping to get some kind of proof.
  right at 8:58pm coming directly overhead from the north i saw the same shadow against the stars i had before. i got alot better look at it this time, it was more of a boomerang shape than a triangle and had five to six pale yellow lights that looked like they wrapped around the craft from the bottom to the top with small spaces in between them. as i snapped on the video camera the screen partally blinded me and made it hard to focus the camera on the object. as it got right on top of me i just watched it with my naked eye while holding the camera in that general direction and praying i caught something. i closed my right eye so the lcd screen would be shut out a bit and kept my eye on it as it made its way south. right before i lost it i clicked over to the regular camera and snapped several pictures.
  after the event i went directly inside to check the camera and after playing with the settings i found all i caught were stars though there was one anomaly that i couldn't really make out. i think i was moving the camera and it was zoomed in. i just don't have the equipment needed to catch this thing. it moves fast and again made no sound. 
  attached is the video i took as well as two pictures. i have three more that i could send as well. 
  like i said before if anyone in the houston, huntsville, corsicana, or dallas/fort worth area has seen a like object contact me at *(wit's email address deleted--cms/sg) i can almost guarantee it will be back tomorrow night.
content.summary: Very large, black triangle or boomerang with five to six pale yellow

content.detailedDescription:
I was cleaning the sensor of my digital camera (nikon d300, 18-135mm lens) and was shooting a frame of clear blue sky to confirm that dirt had been removed. repeated this cleaning action 3 times, after the 3rd time i stepped outside and pointed the camera at clear blue sky and clicked 1 shot off. when i looked at the frame on the camera display i noticed objects in the image that i did not see when i took the photo. i did not see the objects with my sight - did not notice any objects in the sky when i shot the frame. image submitted below.

camera: nikon d300
lens: nikon dx 18-135mm
exposure: 1/160 sec @ f16 iso 200
content.summary: Images showed up unexpected on photo.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving at the time and turned to to set my visor to my left side and that's when i saw it just hovering then iturned back to the road and then back to it and it just shot off southand disappeared. what's strange is that yesterday police and firemen had that whole area blocked off for about 4-5 hours.
content.summary: About the size of the cabin of a police chopper cabin extremely bright and hovering low to the ground

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were outside looking at the harvest moon and jupiter, a few minutes after 9pm on september 22, when two lights became visible to the south-east of us, in the direction of lax. at first i thought they were landing lights of jets coming towards us, but as we watched, they became bright orange and fiery, like the exhaust from a rocket launch. the skies were absolutely clear, and the full moon was lighting up everything so we could see that there was no smoke or contrail coming from the objects. we watched as the objects appeared to go straight up, then turn in different directions (toward the east and south), as they appeared to leave the atmosphere. the objects were about the size of half the diameter of a penny at arms length and were about two pennies apart. the observation lasted maybe two minutes.
content.summary: Two fireballs seen south of santa monica

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i and an older women who was into the ufo phenonmenon were returning to the latter's home that summer night in 1973. this women, we will call her marge noticed this light off in the distance ( very difficult to estimate distance when the sky is pitch black). she then turned off onto a sidestreet just as we were about to enter the outskirts of the city of idaho falls. i recall there were new housing sites in the process of being built.

she drew our attention to this "light," which was clearly visible, but at a distance in the sky. it was peculiar as i had just gotten out of the us air force and never seen anything quite like this, which remained stationary in the sky. some minutes later as we were watching, several 4 or 5 smaller lights of a somewhat orange color were seen exiting from the bottom of the light (object). 

we watched for i guestimate 4 or 5 minutes and suddenly the smaller lights
which looked like "fireflies" returned into the object. marge said these were returning to the "mother" ship? the experience (siting) got even alittle stranger as she flashed her high and low headlight beams on and off. lo and behold, the rotating lights responded in perfect sync. we continued to watch for approx one-half hour and started back. i happened to notice that there was a bright, red ball followed us home. it appeared exactly like a red airport beacon. marge lived in a home overlooking the local airport, and i saw the same red light hovering over the airport, we then went to bed.
content.summary: Appeared as, large bright star light with rotating lights about the middle. color was red and bluish-green. observed smaller orangish exit from bottom of object.

content.detailedDescription:
I smoke and go to my garage to do so since i do not smoke inside the house. i began noticing this star object appear at different times of the evening starting last july. it is visible to the naked eye and can be seen clearly throughout the evening. i decided to take some video since i noticed it having strange and erratic movements. perhaps this is a satellite? i was hoping you could debunk this for me since it is there almost every evening and i don't want to be curious anymore. i hope i am not wasting your time. 

to me it does seem to have a conscience since it does move erratically when a plane comes by. we are located in/near a flight path. you will notice in the video at 7.04 minutes how if moves drastically when a plane comes by as well as at 9.14 minutes.

in my video there are a few dozen or more purple flashes or over-exposures throughout the video. this object also morfs. if you do not see this on the version i sent this in..You will need to see it from my chip or download.

important notes: in minutes (12 total)

2.25- 2.51 goes out of focus
4.21-5.37 moves/floats up quickly
5.43-7.04 moves dramatically from one window pane to another 
7.18      goes back to original position
9.00      disappears
9.14      plane goes by
9.33      blurs
10.00     disappears
10.13     reappears
10.35     different colors

please advise!
content.shape: Chevron,   Disc,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: As seen through my garage windows..An on-going sighting (90 days)- please debunk :)

content.detailedDescription: I saw a streak of light in the sky while turning south onto little mack ave. in st. clair shores, mi 48081 in 1978 or 1979 (i never could remember the year). i was traveling from east to west as i turned onto little mack ave. it was a friday. i thought that it was a reflection off the wing of a plain or something, and remember it was just dusk at the time and there was still a sunset to the west. just ahead, at matin rd., i saw it coming closer, so i turned west onto martin rd. at the intersection (i could never remember if i had to stop at the traffic light there at all, but i know there is one at that intersection), and then i turned directly left into a church parking lot. the disk like craft came down directly over the church/rectory and hovered about 20 ft. above it. i just couldn't believe it. it was silently rotating with bright lights coming off the bottom ot it. it was disk-like with a very wide band of windows around the middle of the thing. thinking back now, the wide band of windows must not have been rotating with the rest of the craft. it was very early spring time, and i had some young chilren in the back set of the car. i sat parked and looking up at it right straight out of my front windshield. there were people/beings (?) looking down at me. it looked like some sort of open spaced mess hall inside with them sitting around squarish tables. two of them then were standing up and came up to the windows, and they just started down at me and the car. others at the tables then turned their heads as if to notice my car. they had shoulder length light hair. their hair styles reminded me of the old page-boy style from years ago. they seemed to have on some sort of jump-suit. i remember thinking that one of them must have been female. i knew they could see me, and it felt really weird to me that they could see me and knew i was there. i can't remember if i'd turned my car engine off or if my car was still runnig (i've always wondered about that). i could see right into their craft. it was very brightly lit up inside. i don't remember seeing/hearing any other traffic lights/car noises or anything. it just seemed totally dark out, and there was no noise at all. i remember i had my hands on the steering wheel. then all of a sudden the craft went right up about aprox. 100 ft. (maybe less), and it veered off to the south-west slowly at first, then it went at lighting speed till it was just a pin prick of light in the sky. i thought that someone else must have seen the thing (no other cars were around at all, no traffic nothing), and i wanted to see where it went. so, i left the parking lot by it's exit onto a side street, whick i took till i got to 11 mile rd. but, by then it wasn't visable at all. i turned left (east) onto 11 mile rd., and i considered going to the police station there at jefferson ave., but thought they'd think i was crazy. i noticed some traffic then. so, i didn't stop at the station, but just turned and contiuned on. i don't know why i just went home, and i didn't think/talk about it at all that night, nor all weekend. also, i didn't phone or tell anyone about it that night either. the children in the back seat were to young to remember what happened. it's possible it may have taken place early in the spring of 1978. i could never remember the date/year at all, but have tried to often. for some reason i can't, but my best guess is that it was in 1979. i know (i'm positive) it was a friday near dusk when i saw this. i didn't feel afraid, but there was some mild fear when the two figures were at the window of their craft looking down at my car. i think i felt this way because i had young children in the back seat of my car with me. i was also in awe that this thing was hovering so close by me over a church/rectory. i didn't have to streach my neck up or back to see it out of my front car windshield at all. it was just like watching something on screen right out of my car windshield. i remember it was totally black out as i watched this thing from the driver's seat of my car. i've wondered about it being totally dark out then, since i could see the sunset when i was turning south onto little mack ave. just a little bit before. i also never took noticed of the time when i got home. the next tuesday, on the car radio i heard that there were sightings of ufo's over northern mi. i've never talked about this with anyone. i'm an educated person with advanced degrees, and i want to remain totally anonymous and not be contacted by anyone. i felt i had to tell mufon about what i saw and i hope that it may be of some help to you and also others. the above phone # and email address are not mine, but bogus i'm sorry to say. i had to put somethng in those areas so i could submit this to you.
content.summary: Rotating with lights behind central band of  windows-tall blond people?? beings  looking down at my car

content.detailedDescription: this event happened in 1992, in houston, texas. intersection of edgebrook and balcones.  exact date unknown. it was approximately midnight. i was 22 at the time. still living with my parents and attending college.  my mother and i decided to get out for a midnight snack. we headed to the convenient store about a mile away. we crossed over edgebrook into the median. before crossing to the other side we noticed this large disc-shaped object with white lights all around the outside of the craft.  it seemed as though it were about 30 or 40 feet wide. it hovered over our car for about 45 secs.  we were in total disbelief. it seemed as though it were really low. like perhaps 100 feet above us.  we looked at each other after both viewing the object. then looked back for about 10 secs at the unknown craft. there was complete and utter silence. the craft made no noise.  then it simply disappeared at a high rate of speed. the object was truly a ufo.  i have never seen anything that closely resembles what i saw before or after that night.
content.summary: Hovered over vehicle

content.detailedDescription:
Last night at, my house in centerville,texas between 9:25 and 9:30. i went out onto the back porch to smoke and was sitting on to steps facing pretty much due north by the north star. i was looking towards the eastern sky over top of the peak of the house to where i often saw a satellite traveling through or near the pegasus constilation.
    as i looked i saw a shadow fly in front of the stars i was looking towards, blotting some of the out, and when i got up to track it i saw a black triangle flying south with either a port list, or it was banking slightly east because i could see it's darker outline against the night sky and i'm pretty sure i was looking at the underneath of the craft. the only comparison i can make about how far away it was is that it looked to be near or just past the houses across the street and not more than one of my hands above the peak of the roof. from that distance i could easily cover it with my palm so it was either a mid-sized craft or further away/higher up than i am estimating.
   it was moving pretty fast and made absolutely no sound whatsoever. i even waited to see if the sound would come but, nothing. the encounter lasted no more than twenty seconds maybe but what i saw before trying to get my wife as a witness was that it looked to be much 'sharper' in the nose than one might expect from a stealth bomber 'wing' plane, but was about the same size width-wise but longer as well. i would say given the distance away it was pretty big.
  along the leading edges, underneath the craft near the edges of the 'wings', were three rectangular lights in a straight line that reminded me of the yellow dotted lines on a road. they were not very bright at all else i would have seen them first so whatever it was didn't want to be seen in my opinion. 
   i should also note now that the moon had not yet risen at that time and it was only later when i was back outside (this time in the front yard) did i notice that a maybe three-quarter moon had risen above the trees acrsoo the street. the only reason i even went to look was that when i saw the triangle the sky was much darker above the house and later i saw the glow from the moon cutting through the light of the stars i had formerly been looking at clearly.
   whatever this was it was gone before my wife made it outside and i had lost it after i went inside to get her. when i say it was moving fast i mean it was really booking it. i was so shocked that my cig went out and it took me three times to relight it. i was out side barefoot trying to find this thing again and my wife thought i was absolutely nuts when i told her what i had seen. i am going to try to set up a camera tonight if the moon is late rising again as soon as it gets dark. maybe i will catch something but i'm not going to hold my breath. 
  if anyone along i-45 from dallas to houston saw anything similar to what i saw on 9/27/2010 please email me @ bulldawg4748@aol.Com. from what it looked like it was either following the backroad known as hwy 75 or perhaps banking to the east towards the trinity river because i was able to see the underside of the triangle. it was coming directly from the north and again was seen in centerville, texas between 9:25 and 9:30.
content.summary: Large black triangle, three to four dull, rectangular lights of a white or dull yellow lining the lateral edges,

content.detailedDescription:
Kennedale, texas - 09-24-10

i am a police officer and was on duty. i was parked dark and stationary along a road under construction, watching for local burglars that hit the businesses on 4-wheelers by coming in through the woods.

i was parked facing south on the west shoulder of 1000 bowman springs rd. in kennedale, texas at 02:23. i noticed what first appeared to be a very bright flickering star to the east at about 45 degrees on the horizon. then i thought it might be a plane.

i noticed it move slowly to the left then stop. i took my binoculars from my bag and looked at the object.

it was then i could see that what appeared to be flickering were rotating white, blue, and sometimes red lights.

the object appeared saucer-like in shape and made no noise. it would hover, then move left, right, and up several times during the duration which lasted 33 minutes.

a jet came into the frame also. i could tell the jet because of the shape, the lights, and the headlight out in front. as the jet approached, the object moved away to the left. when the jet passed, the object moved back.

there was a bare tree branch in the foreground i used as a reference point, and could clearly see the object move. at times it became bigger, and one other time it moved straight away until barely visible, then came back to where it had been, but bigger.

the object seemed to have one bigger, central or top light, with the other lights going around it. i watched this object move around until a low cloud covered it completely from view. when the cloud cover cleared, the object was gone. it was not a star!

it was a full moon with the moon in the west sky. i was hoping someone else would come by so i could show them.

i tried video on my phone, but it is no good.

i would be interested to know if someone else saw this. it could have been seen by nearby mansfield or arlington as well, probably.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blue and white/red lights hovering and changing direction in sky over kennedale/mansfield/arlington, texas.

content.detailedDescription:
September 28, 2010

last night we had a storm that knocked out our power for 6 hours.  before going to bed we decided to take our dog for a walk since the rain had stopped.

this was at about 8:30 pm.  as we walked the sky was strange.  it was as if the sky had been split in two as the low pressure system and dark clouds took up half the sky while the other was crystal clear with a blanket of stars.

since all of the street lights were out the clear part of the sky was incredible.  i paused for a minute and looked up.  what i saw was a small white light traveling extremely fast through the sky.  it was apparent that this light source was extremely high in the sky.  

at first i thought it might be a plane, but it was moving at a speed much faster than a plane in the sky.  it was a single white light with no blinking red or other colored lights. i watched it for a second or two then commented to my son and husband about the light.

my son looked up and immediately saw the light.  he agreed with me that it was traveling at a much faster speed than any airplane you could see in the clouds.  several seconds later my husband saw it as well.

we watched it go on a trajectory from west to east and it probably only took about 30 seconds to completely cross the night sky.  we lost site of the object when it appeared to cross lower in the sky.  the light faded in intensity.  this could have been due to the storm clouds that were still in that portion of the sky.  it was as if it faded away.  as long as we were able to see the light it continued at this incredible speed.

i���ve seen lots of airplanes in the air.  i���ve seen the shuttle take off from the cape in florida.  i���ve never seen anything move that fast in the sky.  it was completely unexplainable.

this was not a shooting star or meteor.   it had no tail or anything following it.  just a single point of light traveling at incredible speeds.

i never felt threatend.....Or afraid.  just mystified about what i was seeing.  there were planes in the sky that we were able to easily identify.  this was nothing like a plane.
content.summary: A single white light traveling at unbelievable speeds in the sky.....Obviously not an airplane or shooting star.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my back yard last night at appx 8:30 pm pst smoking a cigarette when i spotted a boomerang or v shaped craft pass over my house from a northwest to southeast direction.  the craft was very large, made no sound and had 1 glowing light at the tip with 3 glowing white lights down each wing (no blinking lights).  it moved rapidly across the sky, and dissapeared.  a few moments later the same craft passed over in a east to west direction and then a few moments later approached from the south heading to the north, along the legnth of the house.  it then appeared to dissapear.  the craft moved much quicker than an airplane it appeared to be black or dark gray and i could see the outline of it on the clear starlit night we had last night.  the lights on the wings were very pronounced.  i live behind the monterey airport and see aircraft all the time, and this was no airplane or jet that i have ever seen.  i was blown away, spooked but also very intrigued, when it made its 1st pass i called my wife outside and she saw the subsequent passes.  our airport is a regional airport and traffic control closes at 9:00 pm i intend to call the airport to see if anything was spotted on radar.  after looking at photos online this morning, i have found pictures that resemble what i saw last night and they most closely resemble the photos or drawings of the phoenix sightings of 1997, i am attaching photos of what i found online that match it.  it was clearly not like anything i have ever seen before.  i also called a local radio show host last night whom i am aquianted with and reported the sighting to him as well
content.summary: V shape or boomerang shape ufo passed over my home 3 times last night
